# Government Tender Announcement
### Open Construction Source List for CFB Halifax

#### Tender Reference Number: MX-22630044350
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: AR22SLHX
#### Publication Date: 2022-12-05
#### Tender Closing Date: 2026-03-31T15:00:00
#### Amendment Date: 2024-07-12

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is inviting contractors and suppliers to apply for placement on an Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for CFB Halifax and its satellite sites in Nova Scotia. The OCSL will be used to tender commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work with an estimated value of $10 million and below. Interested contractors and suppliers can apply at any time, however, we encourage submissions by January 15, 2023.

The OCSL will be used for three fiscal years: 2023-2024, 2024-2025, and 2025-2026. Contractors and suppliers will be invited to bid on opportunities as they arise, and tenders will close electronically through MERX. It is essential to have an active MERX account to submit electronic bids. To open or reactivate a MERX account, please contact MERX.

## Eligibility Criteria
### Pre-Qualification Requirements
The following pre-qualification requirements are mandatory:
* Contractors and suppliers must be pre-qualified for the Defense Construction Canada (DCC) OCSL.
* Contractors and suppliers must hold the required security clearance(s) at the time of closing.

### Additional Requirements
DCC reserves the right to:
* Continue to use existing source lists for similar or related services.
* Establish other source lists for specific categories of construction services.
* Verify contractor interest and remove those who are no longer interested.
* Require additional pre-qualification requirements for specific tenders.
* Post tenders openly on MERX in lieu of this OCSL.

## Terms and Conditions
### Security Requirements
Tenders and contracts under this OCSL may contain organization and personnel security requirements. Typically, the organization security requirement is Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and reliability status for personnel. However, more stringent requirements may apply, such as Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the SECRET level.
